title: How to Whip up Tasty and Nutritious Meals out of Dollar Store Products

steps.headline: Go to many of your local dollar store.
Start looking for these 4 common canned or packaged food products in dollar stores: Meat, Fish, Pasta/noodles, and vegetables/fruits.
steps.description: Also keep an eye out on other food products that might interests you!

steps.headline: Look for products that you liked and you think you could easily make a simple meal out of.
Make sure to keep an eye out for food items that aren't normally in stores.
steps.description: Because you might not seem them again in the dollar store for a while... or ever.

steps.headline: Shop at different dollar stores as well, as it might give you more options to make something more tasty.
After you bought all the food from the dollar store, start thinking of the possible meals you could make.
Then just fill up your pantry with rest of the food items you have.

text: Go to many of your local dollar store.  Start looking for these 4 common canned or packaged food products in dollar stores: Meat, Fish, Pasta/noodles, and vegetables/fruits. Also keep an eye out on other food products that might interests you! Look for products that you liked and you think you could easily make a simple meal out of.  Make sure to keep an eye out for food items that aren't normally in stores. Because you might not seem them again in the dollar store for a while... or ever. Shop at different dollar stores as well, as it might give you more options to make something more tasty.  After you bought all the food from the dollar store, start thinking of the possible meals you could make.  Then just fill up your pantry with rest of the food items you have.
